title: nannu brOcEvArevvarE
sahitya:
nannu brOcEvArevvarE shrIhari nApAli pennidhI rAma


anupallavi

  anuvuka nI caraNAravindamula-nantarangamuna dhyAnimpu cunna


caraNam    avani bhOgAdi saukhyamulanni-yasthiramani tolakinci bhava sAgaramuna munugaka 
nA hrtpanjaramuna ninunci I bhava vinuta jAjIsumamula tODanu bAgu mIragAnu 
pUjinci shravaNAnandamuga nIdu nAma sankIrtana nutinci sEvinci nava sarOja nayana 
lOkanAyaka nAradAdi mauni harihaya shrI bhAgavata jAla vara gOpAladAsa
